SummarizationTaskParametersBase.description: Supported parameters for both Abstractive Summarization and Extractive Summarization task.

AbstractiveSummarizationTaskParametersBa.description: Supported parameters for an Abstractive Summarization task.

labFeatures.description: Experimental features. Microsoft doesn't offer support for experimental features, but you can engage with summarization working group directly to try out early capabilities without API or SDK upgrade.

CustomTaskParameters.description: Parameters object for a text analysis task using custom models.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

SummaryLengthType.description: Control the length range of the summary. The model will try the best to control the output length into the specified range, but not guaranteed. Aspect 'chapterTitle' won't be affected by this length control, because chapter title is always short and has different linguistic characteristics.

PhraseControl.description: Control the phrases to be used in the summary.

PhraseControlStrategy.description: The strategy to use in phrase control.

values.description: The model is more favor to select the target phrase in the summary if there are multiple alternate.
The model is less favor to select the target phrase in the summary if there are multiple alternate.
The model will avoid to select the target phrase in the summary if that phrase is not in the input.

offset.description: Start position for the context. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: The length of the context. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

ItemizedSummaryContext.description: The context of the summary with item id.

itemId.description: Reference to the itemized input. Example: conversationItem.

AbstractiveSummarizationEvaluationSummar.description: Represents the evaluation summary for a custom abstractive summarization project.

bleu.description: Represents the score of bilingual evaluation understudy

ExportedCustomAbstractiveSummarizationDa.description: Represents an exported data item for a custom abstractive summarization project.

summaryLocation.description: The location of the output summary.

language.description: Represents the language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset split. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.
